wikipedia_page.main: Carey Morris (17 May 1882 – 17 November 1968) was a Welsh painter, illustrator, author and businessman born in Llandeilo, Carmarthenshire.He was related to the Welsh poet Sir Lewis Morris.

response: * Carey Morris (1882–1968), Welsh painter, illustrator, author and businessman
